title: Mishima Bowl
text: This <I>punch'ong<I> bowl displays a mode of decoration known as "rope curtain" because the rows of densely stamped circles resemble the thick, twisted rope curtain hung across doorways.
description: Mishima Bowl; all-over comb motif with five flowers in interior and band of flowers circling sides; pottery with grey glaze. Punch\'ong ware, stoneware
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
